Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the upper-body of a brown pottery slightly ribbed vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of two Coptic characters written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394926) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394926)
